short.ar: في Ninja Action 2 ، يتحكم اللاعبون في محارب نينجا من خلال مستويات مليئة بالأعداء والعقبات. استخدم الحركات البهلوانية.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
In Ninja Action 2, players control a ninja warrior through levels filled with enemies and obstacles. Use acrobatic moves.
Players control their ninja characters using the arrow keys on their keyboard, guiding them through levels filled with obstacles and enemies. The game's objective is to reach each group's end while avoiding or defeating enemies and collecting coins along the way.
The game features smooth, responsive controls and vibrant, detailed graphics, immersing players in the world of a ninja warrior. Players can perform a variety of acrobatic moves, including wall jumps and double jumps, to navigate the levels and defeat enemies.
In addition to the primary campaign mode, Ninja Action 2 also features a survival mode. Players must see how long they can last against increasingly difficult waves of enemies. There is also a boss rush mode, where players face off against powerful bosses in quick succession.
As players move via the game, they can open new weapons and abilities for their ninja character, giving them an edge in combat. These abilities include throwing shurikens, using smoke bombs, and unleashing devastating special attacks.
Overall, Ninja Action 2 is an exciting and challenging HTML5 game that will keep players coming back for more. Its engaging gameplay, smooth controls, and various modes and abilities offer endless entertainment for players of all skill levels.
To swipe Install this extension to play the Ninja Action  Game or offline with no additional downloads and no ads.
